title: How will you display a linked list from the end?

title: अमेठी में देखने के लिए शीर्ष स्थान, गौरीगंज, उत्तर प्रदेश

title: What is a Linked List?
content:
A linked list is a data structure used for storing collections of data. A linked list has the following properties.
- Successive elements are connected by pointers
- The last element points to NULL
- Can grow or shrink in size during execution of a program
- Can be

title: What is a Stack?
content: A stack is a simple data structure used for storing data (similar to Linked Lists). In stack the order in which the data arrives is important.
